website_summaries.verdict: A motion detection alert to your smartphone on this model will let you know if there is any activity going on at home.
pros: Your camera can be viewed from your smartphone with an app
Option to record events on SD or up to 8 hr
Can rotate and scan for a total view of your space
cons: The free cloud storage is only good for 1 yr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper foscam before , and set up in my child’s room, it was a great product, however, I can’t turn that camera to different angel. I decide to try a more expensive one for my patio, this camera has great picture as well, and the better thing I like is you can control this camera to 4 different direction by your cell phone! This is great! I love it, I will buy more camera of foscam if I need in the future , I can control these two cameras by using the same app! Would like to recommend to my friends .
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Useless IR Light = dealbreaker
customer_reviews.text: The narrow beam of the ONE TINY IR light makes this camera useless at night. It's a single IR light - see photo - that produces a single beam of light right only in the center of the image (it's even worse at about 8-15 ft). The old version of this camera filled the entire visible frame with light clearly illuminating both of our cars. It's unbelievable that they would design and produce a product with such an oddball flaw. It's a total dealbreaker so despite the beautiful daytime picture and MUCH improved WiFi, it's being returned.
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Smith IITop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Oh my- don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Set up is ridiculous & frustrating. Google this & you'll see that setup & connectivity is a complicated, well-known issue. Cam never worked. Look at their app FIRST before buying! It is embarrassingly awful! Reviews show less than 2 stars. The worst we've seen for any camera. No support-questions and answers you might have wont be able to be looked up & solved.
customer_reviews.author: funshoppers

customer_reviews.title: Camera may need to be reinstalled after power failure
customer_reviews.text: I have four Foscam Full HD WiFi IP cameras. They all work flawlessly. Unfortunately this last one could not be recognized by the system and even after email assistance by Foscam, I had to return it. While my other cameras work well, they may have to be reinstalled after a power failure or an internet outage. It would be graet if someone at Foscam thought to install a backup battery in the cameras so they keep in memory all the settings after a power failure or an internet outage. It is a pain having to reset all the information on the cameras.
customer_reviews.author: enriver

customer_reviews.title: Great cam + Excellent Support!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th Foscam, I purchased a few to give as gifts. The setup is much easier now with just scanning the bottom of the cam with your device. I had the recent need for tech support, we switched ISP and they had wired our router wrong, I could not get the cam to load so I contacted Foscam, support specialist Desmond was an extreme professional and was in contact with me till my issue was fixed. After ISP tech cam out fix router 4 days later Desmond contacted me to make sure R2 cam was working. Not to many companies have support like this! That is one reason I stay with Foscam!
customer_reviews.author: 6lumbar

customer_reviews.title: Not Plug and Play - Beware Mac Users
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is the third Foscam I've purchased in the last 5 years. For some reason, you can no longer set up the camera using a Mac. The Plug & Play feature is useless if the following applies: 1) Your wifi password has special characters in it, 2) Your router is 5.0 ghz (mine is a combo of 2.4 and 5.0 ghz), and/or 3) You only have Macs (plugins do not work on a Mac when you attempt to set up your camera via web browser). I had no issues setting it up via ethernet connected directly to my router, but I could not set it up wirelessly, rendering it useless. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: alomax

customer_reviews.title: Fine camera unless you want to use it with ONVIF to a NVR
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with the camera if you are using it as a standalone through the Foscam app. But I wanted to use the ONVIF (Open Network Video Interface Forum) protocol for support into NVRs. I have done this with other Foscam cameras with no issue. This one however seems to be barely supported. More of a check-the-box, that it supports the protocol. Video is worst than 1 frame a second in appears (even though it says 15-30 frames a second in the server). Audio is clean - so it is something with its protocol support. Otherwise the camera is fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Clear video . . but
customer_reviews.text: The video is nice HD type video. It works good after I loaded the Foscam App and woke it up. I never intend on using the cloud, it just eats the bandwidth. I connect directly to the camera by connecting to it's IP address and port number. Everything good put one problem. It has what is called a fisheye lens. You end up with a rounded and distorted view. That pretty much sucks. I never expected that type of cheap lens on the camera. I will not buy another RC2 camera. I have other Foscam's but this was my first 1080 camera, somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Old1937

customer_reviews.title: Scammers
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the process of moving to my new house. I'm staying at a friends until then. I don't have my camera manual with me and whenever I call tech support they try to sell me a Walmart gift card and if I don't go along with it they hang up on me! WTF?! On their web site it says they're associated with Amcrest cameras. I would suggest staying away from that brand as well. If you don't buy their cloud storage you have to use an SD card to save video but it has to be formatted in a certain way and Windows can't do that anymore.
customer_reviews.author: D Berwaldt

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Foscam products for about 10 years now. Have several of them in my home that keep an eye on things. The R2C is their best version yet. This particular one has been in use now for about 8 months and is performing very well. I must add that if there is a problem, Foscam people have been very good to work with and if a replacement is necessary, they provide same in and expedient manner. I highly recommend these cameras. They are a great "bang for the buck" product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: They stand by their product
customer_reviews.text: The Foscam cloud camera works great. I love the wide angle, and tilt and pan functionality. I have several Foscam camera’s all liked to my Synology NAS system. When one of the camera’s failed after 18 months, I contacted Foscam customer support and Yiko Deng was very responsive. In exchange for this 5 star review she has the warehouse sending me a new powersupply. Besides this power supply issue, I really like the cameras and think they really stand by their product by sending me a new power supply FOC
customer_reviews.author: TrappistMonk

customer_reviews.title: intermediate to easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd unit of Foscam R2C I got and it works great. Initial setup might get a bit complicated due to the need of a mobile app in order to set it up. On a scale of 1-5 on installation, I would say a 2. Everything can be setup via the android or IOS app. But I find the menus somewhat misleading on the Alerts and notification, and I was having a hard time setting up the SMTP for E-mail notification when detected motion. But overall I was able to get it working with some pointers from the Foscam forum.
customer_reviews.author: A. Au

customer_reviews.title: Updated:  Nothing but issues present
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I wish the speaker for even I try to talk to my dogs was bigger or at least louder. ****Updated Review**** I did like it for the longest time, but as of the last month and a half I have not been able to get it to connect to the WiFi. I have tried to contact their customer service and sent numerous emails. I have yet to receive any response. I wish I could get some help. ****Updated Review**** There has never been any communication between support and myself. I wish there was something I could do.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Decent IP Camera with Serious Privacy Issues
customer_reviews.text: A Foscam driver package must be installed prior to configuration through the Web Portal. The software continuously contacts multiple servers and its activity mirrors that of spyware. Once basic functions were configured I blocked all camera communication outside the network and uninstalled the driver. I use the camera with Blue Iris and it works fairly well. Overall, I would not recommend this camera as is. The image quality is fine, the PTZ functions are subpar (too slow, cannot move down very far), and it requires special software for initial setup.
customer_reviews.author: NETAdmin

customer_reviews.title: Won't work with Alexa, software is terrible
customer_reviews.text: If you are just planning on using the poorly designed Foscam app to connect to this camera, that's fine. If however you are hoping to connect it to an Alexa product, don't bother - it won't work. False advertising on the part of Foscam's part. Software provided is extremely poor. This is a very basic IP camera, but don't expect much. I was hoping to add more Foscam cameras to my network, but clearly that won't happen. You get what you pay for - lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaud H

customer_reviews.title: Awful App - not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Warning! The camera itself is fine, however, none of the apps for this camera work. I could not, for the life of me, download an app that was compatible with this camera. See it for yourself- the reviews for the Foscam app (or any other app that would work with this camera) are awful! I returned it after trying to get it to work for 3 days and went with a Ring camera. I had no problems with the Ring camera.
customer_reviews.author: John Hein

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I had used Foscam cameras (7 of them) all over my house for years and was always satisfied with their performance. One ceased to work and had to be replaced and so I did. What a huge difference between the old and the new. For one thing the setting up process has been significantly simplified but my major surprise was the definition of the images. It is amazing. Now I feel like replacing the six older cameras with these highly improved ones.
customer_reviews.author: Vazinho

customer_reviews.title: This cam would be great if it were not for the picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I am watching a TV on a TV. Lines going up and down. I have changed to all 3 modes. I have changed the stream to all of them and still have this issue. The other issue is I am not going to be using the cloud service I would like to see the add go away, but there is no option to not show this. I was planning on buying two of these, but might not now. If you are fine with all the things I don't like this cam would be great for you. on another note, is there another model that does motion tracking? Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lascelle & Amber Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I now have many of these cameras. For the price and quality you really can’t beat it. There are many out there that are decent or good at one thing. Weather that one thing is night vision or daylight. With these cameras they’re great in night and day. They respond quickly to remote commands and are VERY easy to setup. It’s definitely consumer friendly and a win win. The SDcard recording is sometimes spotty. But that’s due to the motion detection being odd sometimes. Other then that? For the price it’s a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Real nice camera, great price to go with it. Remote control motion is fantastic. Image quality could be better but very nice for the price. Night infrared we don't use as we have our cam in a window. We use ours for watching the birds at our bird feeders. Also don't use motion detection but it does work very well. Definitely recommend this cam. I will be purchasing more, this was my 2nd Foscam camera. May upgrade to the high def one next.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Worst foscam cam I've ever bought though support is helping.  Manual is pretty useless.  YMMV.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 2019-06-13: I have received much from Foscam support and I'm making much headway with my camera. I haven't quite succeeded but the support has been great. Bumping up the stars. This is still not what I used to get in quality for a product from Foscam but they are trying very hard to make me a happy customer. YMMV. ORIGINAL REVIEW: I wanted to tell it to record, have it record to SD card, tell it to stop. Then I'd like to review the video on the card. Good luck with the mess of a product. And note this is micro SD card not SD card. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good deal Butt!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 other Foscam Security Camera's around my property and home. The other I have are just "R2" .. this is an R2C. Being an IT expert.. for the love of me this camera would not hold the password after configuring the settings even though it says SAVED! ... I gave up after several tries... a few hard boots.. etc.. maybe it was a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Arcteryx

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I know that some folks have written negative reviews about Foscam cameras, but I have nothing but good things to say about them. I have 4 Foscam cameras and I love that they can rotate around so I can see all views from all rooms inside my home and to see outside. I can also view all of them from my laptop and on my iPhone when I am away from my home with the easy to use software that can be downloaded from the Internet. Five stars definitely.
customer_reviews.author: carolmu1

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the R2C to replace a faulty FI9831Pv2 and I'm very happy with the new unit. The features are the same as my old camera, but the boot time is much quicker, the camera is more responsive to PT controls from mobile apps (i use the official Foscam app as well as Synology's Surveillance Station mobile app), and the picture quality is sooooo much better since it's 1080p. I don't use any of the remote access or recording features through Foscam since i have a Synology NAS, so i can't comment on those. Overall, it's a great budget camera for indoor use!
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: I use them as surveillance cameras and they are fantastic, human motion is accurate too
customer_reviews.text: I know these say they are indoor cameras but I have had mine hung under the eves of my roof outside in temperatures from 0-100 and they have continued to work for over 2 years now. I am very very pleased with them. Granted mine are protected from generally getting wet but still function amazing. Image quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Myridge

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: A lot of value for the money, for my home camera network I found sticking with a well supported name brand is worth it. I have tried a number of others and just too much trouble to set up. I had some questions about the camera and got a fast response from Yiko at support@foscam.com and was well taken care of and very happy. Image quality is great by the way and 1080 is enough and I am not going to run a higher res even if I could to save the load on my server.
customer_reviews.author: ENTPRN

customer_reviews.title: Great features, fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a flexible programmable camera with pan and tilt functionality that I can work with through my own programs. I found this camera packed with features for everyone, from high level users needing to interface with Alexa to programmers who need access to camera features through a command line structure. The support is excellent also - just one email and I received a response back from Desmond at customer service within a few hours with the exact answer and document I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Swimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but wish they'd left the software alone
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cam with super picture quality, built in speaker and mic, SD slot, etc but it seems like the company compromised its compatibility and usability in order to push their proprietary app so they can sell cloud subscription services. Older foscams worked fine with third-party apps and needed no special laggy plug-in to login from a PC but not this one. It's a shame because like I said it's a beautiful camera but they crippled its usability.
customer_reviews.author: Stealthy like a cat

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY! Don't recommend. Barely connects when needed! 🙅🏽
customer_reviews.text: I hate this camera. It barely connects. It took long as heck to set up with iPhone, that I actually had to set up with a friends android. Its hard to move and control from the app. The camera moves and is looking at the ceiling or the ground. I want my money back. I don't recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: sazzynita

customer_reviews.title: Keeps losing connection
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The picture is good, It is small so doesn't take up a lot of space. It was easy to set up Cons: I have this item connected with a physical Ethernet cable but it keeps losing connection with the web utility and has to be refreshed, though everything else in the house connected to the internet does not. That is annoying and the first IP camera which has done this. I would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: SoulsSong

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera that could send files to an FTP server which this one does. Setup took me a few to learn the interface but once you learn it, it's easy to navigate. The only negative comment is that you can't save files to the SD card and the FTP server. You have to choose where the files will go. On a good note, you don't need an SD card if you will be sending the files to an FTP server. The camera has enough internal memory to hold the images and videos while it is sending them.
customer_reviews.author: Neil C.

customer_reviews.title: Local SD Card and Firmware Don't Measure Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice camera that I have set up indoors to monitor the back entrance to my house. The night vision, picture quality, and motion detector all work great. My complaints are that the firmware and corresponding Foscam app don't allow much configuration for saving locally to an SD card. The snapshots aren't consistent and there's no way to manage files from within the app or even view them. It's almost useless to have this functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hardware, but installation is still a mess, along with the app and the browser functionality
customer_reviews.text: Really bad installation process and poor user interface in the Android app, the windows app, and the browser plug-in. I can use VLC or the phone app to view video, but the windows app stopped showing video an hour later for no reason I can find. I can send audio via the phone app, but cannot hear audio with any of the interfaces. At least the browser plug-in for IE worked with my previous Foscam. This one just shows the "Loading" circle forever.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Systems Engineer (Ret)

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras but half failed on me. Just a wish they had better quality control
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras, but sadly only half had worked for me or failed a little over a year. If they get quality control adjusted, these are best valor for the money for all wifi cameras....just need to work better consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great little IP Cam!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is relatively easy to set up and has an impressive night vision area of illumination. It does require a 2.4 GHz wireless network connection but if your router has band steering then it's a non-issue. If not, just spin up a guest network or other SSID to use for IoT devices and this cam will be online in no time. It has a very fair picture quality and offers enough controls to make it a bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JeninNY

customer_reviews.title: Great quality video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Foscam R2C to replace an R2 that died after 7-8 years in our barn. I was very happy with the R2. The picture quality of the R2C is great, day and night. One thing missing from the R2C is optical zoom. R2C is supposed to be an upgrade to R2, so why did they drop optical zoom? The app allow me to zoom the video but it’s not as clear as optical zoom.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. But the FHD and HD findings are not working. When you change between SD, HD, and FHD the camera quickly resets itself of its working properly. Mine is just stuck on the SD mode. The R2C also does NOT have digital zoom, so beware when you buy. For only a few more dollars you can purchase the R2 with digital zoom, which I prefer. This camera is currently inside my chicken coop so I can watch my chickens all day. I may have to return due to the broken FHD feature. And yes, I updated the firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wellman

customer_reviews.title: A Microphone In Your Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Share the camera with anyone, and they can LISTEN IN to what you're doing anytime they want. (Yep, even that.) To not have a way to turn off the mic is unforgivable. It may even open you up to legal problems: in many states, you're not allowed to record audio of people unless they are aware that you are doing so. For me, this camera sits in my bedroom window that overlooks the driveway in my rural community. Can't turn off the mic? Then the thing is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: This is True

customer_reviews.title: Three Cameras, Three Failures in under one year
customer_reviews.text: These cameras drop like flies - they become unconnectable, and no matter how many times you try resetting them, they simply will not become connectable again. I've sent two of them in for replacement, and in fairness, Foscam did replace them without too much hassle - but now that I've had a third failure, it's time to give up and switch to a more reliable model entirely.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one. Too much hassle
customer_reviews.text: Not quick to access your camera. It's a 2 step process. Log in with a fingerprint and then you have to manually put in your credentials to view your camera. Time stamp was inaccurate. It was a whole day off and no way to change it. And 8 hours of recording is a joke because it's not loop recording. And to add more days of recording you have to pay big bucks for cloud service. Definitely not with the money. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN GARLAND

customer_reviews.title: Good quality video, good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Foscam R2C camera to replace one of my old Foscam FI8910W that went bad after more than 10 years of service. The HD video quality is much better compared to the FI8910W. It is not as versatile as the R2 as it does not zoom, it only pans/tilts. However, it costs much less than the R2. The R2C provides all that's needed to monitor an average-size room in a house. The initial setup was very straight forward and very similar to other Foscam products. It has now been operating wirelessly for almost 2 weeks without any problems. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Foscam - Easy and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several Foscam IP cameras over the years and always had good luck with them. Recently I made the mistake of purchasing a camera from another brand and immediately regretted it after running into several problems so I quickly returned it and replaced with this Foscam which has worked perfectly (as expected) right out of the box. Installation was a breeze and I like how Foscam cameras can easily be added to pretty much any IP Camera app without a problem -- some other brands don't make it so easy. I learned my lesson and will stick with Foscam from this point forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls short of perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Work great unless you lose power. Then they return to a “home” position and are no longer pointing at what you want them to and might even render them useless until you login to them and reposition. Horrible idea. They also pick up some random time of the day too when this happens. Don’t get these if you need to watch something specific.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 times with an Amazon chat person to get it set up, but it is working as I wanted now. I have moved it 4 times, trying to find the view I wanted, and it tolerated all my moves without messing up. I haven't checked motion detection yet. That's next. I am 80 years old and a lot of the set up problems I experienced were because I am only moderately tech savy. I was amazed at how patient the chat people were.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is pretty good as well as the WiFi connection, although I wish the IR Lights were a bit brighter. I purchased this camera for $42 and it literally arrived the following day. You could say, I’m more than happy with my purchase and if I didn’t own three other Foscam Security Cameras I’d purchase another R2 for such a low price in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Ruined by the new noise cancelling feature
customer_reviews.text: These cameras have great quality but the new noise cancelling feature KILLS it. Ours is in our baby’s room and the sound machine gets picked up in spurts.. it sounds like there are aliens in the room watching the alien news.. they don’t have a way to turn the feature off rendering this camera total useless in our case... not good :(
customer_reviews.author: Katerina's got her smile :)

customer_reviews.title: Alerts and quick report
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, I have not tested yet the motion detection alert that sometimes has a little latency, but I will check it when the camera is put in place. I have to highlight the outstanding job that Foscam technical support is doing, specially Mr Devin Jin who has been guiding me with the new RC2 Camera issues. Ten stars for you Devin, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: RUGO

customer_reviews.title: Dead in Less than a Year
customer_reviews.text: I had 3 of these units and all are now dead after less than a year. Firmware upgrades are horrible and the user interface is very dated. Cameras worked great for the first few months then suffered frequent disconnects. Finally the units stopped doing pan/tilt functions. When the movement stops your camera can no longer reboot as it can not calibrate the position. My D-Link cameras that are 5 years older than these are still fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The perfect camera.
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much, it has a nice picture too, so I can see all details in picture with a clear sound, it is easy to connect it to WIFI, if you want to get a camera for your front door to secure your house it is the one. I tried it for my baby room it is the perfect one, I can leave it on and I can hear everything and see hem.
customer_reviews.author: Samarsan

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous Abominable customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed customer support so called their help line.844-344-1113 Overseas Rep wanted my credit card number for a "free" $100 gift card for only $4.99 before helping. Told him I was not interested but did need tech help. He refused and said No support without CC number. I refused and he told me to just hang up and don't call back. I refused and he called me a "MOTHER-----R! Last Foscam I'll buy!
customer_reviews.author: Harleywood

customer_reviews.title: Keep your home safe!
customer_reviews.text: I started using security cameras after my co workers house got robbed! I bought this camera to watch our living room since our front door leads right to it. I connected it to be phone easily and it’s super easy to monitor and I love being able to get notifications every time there is a motion! It gives me peace of mind knowing my home is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Paula and Minh

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this small, inexpensive, dependable camera!
customer_reviews.text: A powerful little camera - amazing clarity. From under my porch roof at night I could see the make of a car 156 ft away. In my living room - crisp details; review past events via the motion detection feature. A previous Foscam camera ran for 5 yrs with no problem - I can switch between both feeds on my phone. Great tech support – my newbie questions about Wifi and IP address - they didn’t blink!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.text: This Foscam 2C camera is amazing. Picture clear all of the time, as well as great night time infrared, it pans, tilts, can talk right through the app.... I have 3 of them and even gifted to 2 family members. I also have the cloud service which gives me piece of mind to review footage right from phone.!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great cam
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Foscam I bought. Compared to the previous two older generation ones, this camera has much better improved image quality, view angle and quieter movement. I use it indoor and the night vision clarity and range are great. The only downside I experience is the browser plugin when viewing it on PC. It requires downloading and installation of a plug-in program that constantly runs behind.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Sheng

customer_reviews.title: A great camera and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used Foscam cameras for years with Blue Iris and Vera home control and they have always worked very well. I recently purchased the R2C to upgrade my older cameras and it connected right up to Blue Iris with no trouble and allows me to control the PTZ from my phone away from home. The viewing angle is much wider and at the higher resolution the picture is much clearer. I have been very happy with the camera so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lionsden

customer_reviews.title: Used...  Could not get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased what was supposed to be a new camera. This item arrived with the box open, the user/password did not work, the reset did not work, and the camera was obviously broken. Cannot get a response from Foscam customer support. Returning to Amazon and moving on to a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Decent hardware, awful software/firmware
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a lot of potential. The image/video quality is good. Unfortunately the available options to interface with it via anything other than the provided probably-backdoored software are unreliable at best. If you aren't using external software to monitor this, it's probably good enough. Otherwise spend the money on something reliable.
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: camera was easy to set up, just have to get use to the app, at the beginning i was not able to use a 128 gb but now with great customer service i was able to use it, it takes a little to get answers but they will help u .camera works great, set up not as hard, this an actual pic from the camera
customer_reviews.author: I. Arenas

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was very easy to install and had up working in under 10 minutes. instructions were easy to follow. Picture clarity even in low lighting is very good. I am using it as a baby monitor. It has motion and sound detection, sends a notification to my phone. App is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: anna rice

customer_reviews.title: good customer service and follow up
customer_reviews.text: some of my cameras were ‘oversensitive’ to motion detection. Foscam has newer technology to include recognition of a person as contrasted to general motion like tree shadows and has offered me one to evaluate. Hope it works well - they get an A for effort at this point
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything. It has very sensitive motion and sound detection, night vision, voice , you can make a password for other people to see. I use it as a baby monitor and when not home for surveillance. 4 stars because when I connect in the computer it stays with the same image, does not have live video dont know why.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice camera with great picture
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of them 2 R2s and a G2. I found the NVR on the Foscam site and had trouble getting it set up. Stephen from Foscam contacted me and after a round of emails collecteting information Stephen quickly diagnosed that the NVR software I had was out of date. In about 15 minutes controlling my PC he downloaded the right version and got me the access I needed to complete the set up. I think I can get it finsihed shortly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 of these...I love the app. They aren't too complicated to install. You can share the camera feed with family. I like to check in and make sure everything is ok. There's an option for extra cloud services etc. The company stands by their stuff, Yiko very helpful
customer_reviews.author: C. Pursell

customer_reviews.title: Good security camera, but better support
customer_reviews.text: The camera is working well although it was a little difficult to install where I needed it. It was located some 50 feet away and the WIFI signal needed to pass through a couple of walls. Not the best environment, but I did get it to work thanks in no small part to Tracy, the support engineer. Tracy was very responsive to every question I ask and had several suggests to make the camera work. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: IP Cam with a lot of features
customer_reviews.text: Installed the camera today. The image quality is good. The app is easy to use. There are other generic apps to control Foscam cameras, which has good reviews. However, I found the third party apps lacking the features in the original app. Although the foscam app froze once on me, I would still recommend trying the original app first. The night view is fine too. Will report back in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Does not reconnect upon power glitch or outage.
customer_reviews.text: The cameras work great until a power outage than fail to reconnect when the power is restored. This applies to even a momentary glitch in power. The units then need to be unplugged and unplugged in order to find the wireless. So, totally useless if your not home, completely negating the purpose of needing a camera. Find another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Greg V

customer_reviews.title: high resolution, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for baby monitor and my friend recommend this camera to me. The price of this one is really friendly and the resolution is quite high. Most importantly, it is easy to set up. It helps me a lot. When I went out for work, I can check my baby's status anywhere and anytime through the app.I can also chat with our nanny immediately if I found some promblems. Over all, it's a good product and I would recommend it to my friends,too.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this camera. The cameras that I purchased worked fine for a month. The Foscam app requested that I upgrade the firmware in the camera. After I did this, the cameras were no longer accessible off the local internet Ethernet. Foscam doesn't respond to emails and there seems to be no US based tech support phone number. The firmware update makes the cameras unusable on other ip camera apps. Needless to say, I’m not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Foscam USED to be a great company. They no longer have customer service representatives so you are on your own. But what I'm really piss about is that when I purchased this camera, it was supposed to come with free Cloud. NO CLOUD!! They are trying to make you purchase the cloud. And forget about the scandisk card slot. It doesn't record ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Nova Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great WiFi IP Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed by the sharp picture quality, excellent sound and good night vision. Motion detection and two-day audio are also awesome. What I like most: 1. Easy to set up, connected to WIFI. 2. Picture quality is great. Night vision is also super good. We use 1080p full HD video mode. In low internet speed setting, other picture modes (HD, etc.) may be a better choice. 3. APP very easy to use, adjust motion sensitivity, lens angle, etc. 4. All family members have access to this camera through their smartphones. A very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Guo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Easy set up. Very affordable. Quality of picture is awesome. Will purchase more for other rooms. I have an elderly mother living at home alone and this allows us to keep on eye on her. It’s in real time. Can also rotate the view right from your phone. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is such a better deal than spending the $200 on a specific branded pet camera (Which I have also known that dogs destroy to get to the treats inside the camera for the ones that you can dispense treats from.). I can easily see during day or night, talk and listen to my dog, pan 360 degrees, and set alarms for motion or sound (I keep those off because they are very sensitive and i get alerted constantly when he is awake).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No RTSP support
customer_reviews.text: I know there is no Linux support for this, but it failed things that do not even involve Linux. The manual does not match what you need to do to activate it, you have to set it up with a smart phone and the screen is way too small for this, and I could not connect via RSTP. It IS apparently well built and if you are a Windows user this may be fine, but absolutely fails when trying to use otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: DMonty

customer_reviews.title: Must be tech savvy
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have an understanding of port forwarding and other networking skills, you may be stuck in local mode. This means you can only see the stream will connected to the same wifi as your camera. So, I'm not able to use this camera without investing a good amount of time learning how to program the camera and my home router. It's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Great Cameras and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Over the past years I have purchased seven Foscam cameras. My wife and I use them to monitor our pets when we're away. I find the custom options, functionality, picture quality and price of the cameras are great! Being able to tilt and pan each camera is a big plus! I recently had a service question and I contacted Foscam directly via email. Yiko answered my email very quickly and was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarGuy

customer_reviews.title: Poor WiFi
customer_reviews.text: The camera is overall a good buy with decent images and offers ONVIF, RTSP and works with Home NVRs (as opposed to requiring cloud services). The only downfalls I have found are: - poor WiFi (as compared to the Foscam C1 under identical conditions). - the WiFi will not stay connected to a router if the SSID is hidden. - poor auto time updates. The update regularly fails and randomly resets the clock. I keep my cameras up to date with the latest firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Uuugh

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera which is why I have two! Well built (had them since Sept 2019) and minimal lag time. Every time I connect to my cameras from my app it does it so very quickly too. The picture quality is what I expected and the sound is not bad. Highly recommend it to everyone. I love the panning and tilting feature and after sales customer service is EXCELLENT! Thank you very much Yiko for your support and help when I had questions.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tung

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and better looking camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Foscam cameras for my home security system which runs on a Synology server since 2012. The early models are still running and I have never had one fail. The R2C has the best image so far and it looks so much better than the earlier models. Foscam support has always been very helpful with any issue I have had. Most recently Tracy was very helpful in working with me on one of their recent promotions.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Nystrom

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more for zoom
customer_reviews.text: I have three foscams. Good pictures but the app isn’t reliable to view them. Also, be aware that this particular model doesn’t allow you to zoom in and then have it record while zoom— only when it’s on live stream with two fingers . They do have other models that I have that do zoom though. I was annoyed because this one doesn’t and it’s not clearly stated In the description. Pay a little more and get a different Foscam.
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: not Wifi capable
customer_reviews.text: I must have received a lemon because this one basicall has zero wifi range. Literally I was able to connect to wifi only if the camera is within 3ft or less to the wifi router. Wired network works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: SteelRing

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you can figure out the configuration. AC adapter faulty and needed replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Camera works well if you are a bit tech savvy and can figure out the config. A little clunky but it works. My AC adapter stopped working properly a few months after receiving the camera (camera would continuously click and never fully power up all of a sudden) but a Foscam tech support member (thanks Desmond!) helped me out with getting a replacement sent in the mail, which was pretty quick and painless. Overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: just4747

customer_reviews.title: Useless, no live feed
customer_reviews.text: There is a half minute delay in what's happening and what you see. This renders camera angle adjustments and voice options useless. There's a sleep option but no wake option. You have to program when the light comes on. Other cameras turn it on when they need it, much more useful. Big company, bad coding.
customer_reviews.author: Pw Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Movement detected, but no video clip
customer_reviews.text: It sends a notifications when there is movement detected but when i go to watch it there is no video clip Customer service is in China...and they emailed me back to tell me there is spmething wrong with my firmware so i have to connect ti Ethernet cable and follow her directions to make it work I asked her what if burglary happened... She did not reply back I would stay away and boycott this company altogether
customer_reviews.author: Young Han Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: If you use the Foscam camera search software to locate the camera on your WIRED network first, the setup goes very fast. I have a lot of these cameras n use in commercial applications mounted upside down, high on the walls so I can use the Pan & Tilt function. The Wi-fi works great, but more than 4 cameras will slow down a 100 mbs network, unless you use different access points.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The camera met all my expectations +++
customer_reviews.text: The configuration was quick and painless. There were absolutely no issues with operating the camera through my iphone. I was pleasantly surprised by the clarity of the night vision and at this price, it was a steal. I did have some issues with the firmware but Yiko Deng in customer support really helped me out. I will definitely look at FOSCAM for my next orders!
customer_reviews.author: PTD62

customer_reviews.title: Nice indoor camera!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have five R2C cameras and they work great. The cameras are very easy to set up and they have many useful features. I also find that the live view through the android app has a good response time. Also, I like that I can view all of my Foscam cameras through a single application (i.e. the R2C, G2, and the E1 base station). However, I find that motion detection is a bit sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This camera sucks. It constantly sends me alarms of motion detection and when I look - absolutely nothing. I have set indoors facing a solid door. The basic service that comes with it doesn’t let you review film from longer than 8 hours ago, instead tries to rope you into an expensive subscription. I don’t understand why I can’t set it to have it load the film to my pc in the same network... overpriced trash
customer_reviews.author: travis p.

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and returned 3 cameras, different brands. This FOSCOM was the first that actually worked! Easy set up and works great! the other brands would only let me see the video when I was at home. this one lets me see the cat when I am away! Love the great set up with the app! Will purchase again, for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Zeah

customer_reviews.title: Very poor cameras
customer_reviews.text: Please stay away from Foscam. They have been bought out. Tech phone line not operational. Returned last camera purchased. Never successfully added to my other 2 Foscam cameras. Worked with tech support email for over 2 days. No success. Replacing with Wyze cameras.
customer_reviews.author: WT

customer_reviews.title: Camera is easy to set up and imagges are great.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was easy to set up and the problems I had were with my network which the Foscam support staff was patient in working with me to solve. In particular, kudos go to Yiko Deng for his support in resolving my network issues allowing full and complete access to the camera. What I liked in particular was the flexibility in capturing videos/images to the SD Card, my local disk and in my email. Support was just fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Goodman

customer_reviews.title: After all these years they still have miserable usability.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would stay with the big name so I could plug it, open a browser window, set up email notification, and be done. WRONG. Odd software, several downloads, and still not working. Amazing. Foscam - wake up - you've got lots of products, give us one web interface that will make this go smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom N

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed some issues with connectivity on the camera (actually a Foscam R4), so I emailed Foscam support. ZION was extremely helpful and basically did the entire installation for me. It could not have been easier. I use the camera to monitor an owl box, and ZION saved the day. I was able to get the camera up and running before the owls came back. Thanks ZION and Foscam!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin B.

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made garbage software. Website description says it supports firefox and chrome, but it is impossible to login using those. Foscam cameras are also poorly secured and can be easily used to spy on you.
customer_reviews.author: azezal

customer_reviews.title: The easiest of any Foscam camera to setup
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Foscam since the days of manual port-forwarding. This is really a great camera and the cloud service is well worth the money. Very easy to set up. Download the Foscam app, follow the instructions and you are all set. The picture quality is excellent and both the send and receive audio are much improved and work well for our home needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jk8134

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use, recognized right away by my Foscam NVR.
customer_reviews.text: I bough these as an upgrade for my Foscam FI8918 cameras. They are attractive and easy to install. The NVRs see them right away. No issues with quality or ease of installation. In particular I like the "test" button for Wifi configuration, so you can see the settings are correct before you save them. I can use my iPad to talk to people through the camera from a remote location, which is a bonus. These are a good deal for the price. Two complaints: 1. The web interface only works with Internet Explorer on Windows (it uses ActiveX). 2. The cameras randomly forget some settings, like the timezone (they revert back to GMT)
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: I have older models of Foscam and these new ones are so easy to set up!!! no more logging into router, manually exporting port numbers, all the other troublesome issues. Just download app. hardwire to router, scam QR code on bottom of camera and the camera tells you you are set up as a wired camera. Disconnect ethernet wire and then you are automatically wireless. Piece of cake, and the picture quality is awsome.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzu

customer_reviews.title: Best IP camera
customer_reviews.text: of all the I P cameras I have purchased over the years I found this to be the best for my use. I have it sitting in the picture window in the front of our house looking out toward the street. The night time video is best I have had
customer_reviews.author: ChuckM

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had 7 Foscam cameras over the last 5 or 6 years and am satisfied with them. Several of them have died after 2-3 years but what can you expect from a cheap camera. I just replaced them with a newer one that has a microsd card slot that you can record to and higher resolution and they are more reliable. Good camera...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Very recommended product.
customer_reviews.text: FosCam review Foscam Camera is easy to setup, only a few clicks on cellphone and are ready to use. In my case I use then connected to a NAS, and works flawless. The set up of the camera was easy. The picture and sound quality are very good. The camera is able to detect sound or movement, and you can set up notifications on your phone. You can pans, zooms, the sound is two-way. Very recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Menino

customer_reviews.title: R2C is a Great upgrade in the Foscam Line of Cameras
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera because it works with Alexa. I use my cameras, I have a total of 4 Foscam cameras for monitoring my pets. Customer service is great. Whenever I have a question I get a quick response from Frank on Amazon. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

product_meta.title: Foscam Security Camera WiFi IP Home Camera,R2C 1080P HD Baby Monitor Wireless Pet Camera with AI Human & Sound Detection, Free Cloud, 2-Way Audio,Works with Alexa, Pan/Tilt, Night Vision, Black
feature_bullets: Latest AI Human Detection/Motion/Sound Detection Available. Foscam R2C smart security camera supports intelligent human detection that will intelligently identify human activities,and decrease the false alarms like flying birds,fallen leaves or other objects.Only Human-detected alerts will be sent to your APP/Email/Cloud in comparison with motion detection.Please upgrade your APP to the latest version if you can’t find the function.Motion or sound detection is also available.

Alexa & Google Assistant Compatible with APP & Firmware Upgraded.Free you hands with voice control. Free Video Management System on PC or Free Foscam App can help configure & control the WIFI camera easily. Web interface is compliant if you don’t want to download software on PC. Just control the cams anytime, anywhere in anyway.

Full HD 1080P Resolution @ 25fps wireless Camera other than 15fps. Night vision up to 26ft and 4x digital zoom to capture more details.The IP camera also can hide the lens totally to help you get privacy protection when needed. Perfect for workplace, home ,garage and other indoor application as security camera, pet camera & baby monitor.

Foscam Free 7-Day Cloud Service with 1 month vadility is included which can help offer app message/email to you with image captured, short video recorded in the last 7 days. In comparison,other bands’ cloud camera only offers message only.And you can choose to use SD Card(Not Included, Up to 128G.Compatible with FAT32 Format SD card Only. You can format SD Card to FAT32 via tool on https://www.foscam.com/faqs/view.html?id=207 directly), FTP or Onvif compatible NVR to save the files as well.

Foscam is a 12-year home security surveillance system solutions provider. Join the 20 Million+ powered by our leading technology. Foscam hassles free with 30-day return & refund terms with 1 year US Warranty. You can contact support by email support@foscam.com or by clicking contacting seller(Foscam Direct) on your order list on Amazon.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars955 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
